ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 52
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve got an idea! Any of you remember the oil crisis of the 70 s?  You know, when we had to wait in line at the gas stations because of the huge oil
ygData.messageBody:
I've got an idea! Any of you remember the "oil crisis" of the 70's? You
know, when we had to wait in line at the gas stations because of the huge
"oil sortage" and all along the oil tankers were sitting in the Delware
River loaded with oil waiting for prices to go up before they'd bring in the
oil? Well, I say we smiths do the same. All smiths stop making/selling
banded until there's such a high demand that the people who want to buy it
keep raising the price they are willing to pay. I think we can get the price
to go up 3-5pp if everyone cooperates. Think about that, 7pp for a banded
gorget. It can happen. We can make it happen. We can hold Norrath by its
balls. WE SMITHS CAN RULE NORRATH!

Of course, I'll have to work on my smithing considering it's only at about
13 right now.

Kulin <lvl 10 warrior on the Rallos Zek server>
